definition: an accumulation of jobs not done or materials not processed that are yet to be dealt with (especially unfilled customer orders for products or services), to accumulate and create a backlog
details:
noun
- an accumulation of jobs not done or materials not processed that are yet to be dealt with (especially unfilled customer orders for products or services)
- something kept back or saved for future use or a special purpose
= synonyms: reserve
- the large log at the back of a hearth fire
verb
- to accumulate and create a backlog
= example: to accumulate and create a backlog
